resources.string: Enter Phone Numbers of your trusted contacts
Msg should contain: <password>#<command>\nPassword should match, and command can be any of the following:

1. Wifi: turn on/off wifi
2. Ring phone: ring
3. Change audio modes:
		silent mode/vibrate mode/general mode
4. Data: turn on data
5. Bluetooth: turn on/off bluetooth
6. Flashlight: turn on/off flash
7. Call: call <number>

Example: passwd123#ring

The app will run in background, please close the app to save power!
